channel.title: Schoolbase on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in Schoolbase on NS News and Views

item.title: Schoolbase Rewards and Sanctions via email
item.description: At St Mary’s Shaftesbury, one of the many additional functions we have built, to work alongside our Schoolbase MIS (Management Information System), is the automation of a weekly ‘Rewards and Sanctions’ report.

item.title: Schoolbase to create and populate AD groups
item.description: At St Mary’s we use Schoolbase from Furlong Solutions, for our MIS - we have done so for several years (indeed my understanding is that we were the second or third official school to have the system in production).
